scripts.build:dev: cpx src/assets/*.{mp3,ogg,wav} bin/js-debug/assets/ && cpx node_modules/openfl/dist/openfl.min.js bin/js-debug && cpx node_modules/actuate/dist/actuate.min.js bin/js-debug && cpx node_modules/howler/dist/howler.min.js bin/js-debug && asconfigc --debug=true
scripts.build:prod: cpx src/assets/*.{mp3,ogg,wav} bin/js-release/assets/ && cpx node_modules/openfl/dist/openfl.min.js bin/js-release && cpx node_modules/actuate/dist/actuate.min.js bin/js-release && cpx node_modules/howler/dist/howler.min.js bin/js-release && asconfigc --debug=false
